name: Mario Kart Double Dash: Extended
summary:
Mario Kart Double Dash: Extended is a Mod for Mario Kart Double Dash.
It adds 16 new Retro Tracks, New Karts, 4 Player Grand Prix, a 200cc Mode.

In Version 2,0 there were new Custom Tracks and Battle Arenas added to the Game.
